website_summaries.verdict: This appliance is at its best when you pair it with the company's delicious meals. Not into a meal delivery service? Consider a regular countertop oven.
pros: You scan the bar code from Tovala's prepackaged, refrigerated meals on the the $400 Tovala Smart Oven, and the appliance automatically cooks them with little effort on your part
The Tovala meals are leaps and bounds ahead of traditional convenience foods like frozen TV dinners
cons: As a countertop steam oven, the Tovala itself is just OK. And the accompanying app doesn't add much to your cooking

customer_reviews.title: Total game changer in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited about my new Tovala! It was super easy to set up and I'm already enjoying delicious, easy and healthy meals. The app has a ton of great recipes (I especially appreciate the "For Kids" section) and I'm also loving the gourmet meal delivery service a few nights a week. Huge step-up from the greasy delivery and microwaved meals that I was eating before. I can't wait to learn more ways to put this genius little oven to work. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Finally Caved And Got One
customer_reviews.text: We had been discussing buying one of these for months and finally bought one last week - wish we had done it much sooner! Very efficient use of space - we live in an apartment and don't have a large kitchen, but the oven fits perfectly on our counter top. Pretty remarkable how versatile this thing is given its size. Honestly we'll probably replace our microwave outright in the next few weeks with the Tovala. We're two working professionals with a young child at home so the meal delivery service is a HUGE added bonus too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so versatile. I can’t wait to replace my toaster oven. I have had the opportunity to try many of these meals and every last one has been delicious. It’s like being in a 5 star restaurant only you can wear your sweat pants. Looking forward to trying my own recipes too. These people are genius creating a product that allows busy people like me to eat healthy and spend that extra cooking time with my family and not in the kitchen. Wait did I mention clean up? Yet more time savings. The whole thing is a win win!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamielee

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and great food
customer_reviews.text: Super simple cooking. Food was delicious and minimal cleanup. Great app. too. I can control everyone with my phone. I am really satisfied with the purchase. There is also a great variety of food options and the oven reheats food very well.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyRo

customer_reviews.title: Not operatable.

customer_reviews.title: I love my Tovala
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tovala! It makes delicious, healthy meals for my whole family and is so easy to use. It really takes the stress out of weeknights knowing that I will have good food to feed my kids and myself and wont' have to spend a ton of time cooking. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke R

customer_reviews.title: A Wise Investment for Your Family!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a Great Oven! So far I’ve roasted vegetables and made chicken thighs which turn out very well! Crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside! Just Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: TECH BLOCK INTERNATIONAL

customer_reviews.title: What we’ve been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this product top-notch in its ability to cook using different mediums, but combined with the app and the meal plans, this product is everything we have been looking for. Eating healthy, fresh meals with essentially no prep time involved has been impossible for us to find, and we have finally found our perfect dinner machine with Tovala! I highly encourage anyone thinking of buying a Tovala to give it a try like we did - it’s one of the best products we have ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice steam feature, but stops working
customer_reviews.text: The steam feature was working, but not any more. Properly toasts only one side of bread. Also, once you get it on your wireless network, there is no way to remove it; no reset to factory. I removed it from my Tovala account per their instructions, but it still appears. It also puts out 2 error messages into my router's log, every minute, 24/7. I have it unplugged soon to be trashed. It was $350 when I bought it late last year, now it's trash.
customer_reviews.author: jimvn

customer_reviews.title: Late review--had this for a year and I love it
customer_reviews.text: Is it a glorified toaster oven? Yes. Is it worth the price? Yes. Personally, I don't use it for the prepackaged Tovala meal kits. I use it to reheat leftovers and cook small items that wouldn't make sense in my full-sized oven. No surprise there. But what I think sets it apart from being just another toaster oven is simply how it cooks these things. Specifically, the steam function is a game changer. When you cook food in this, it goes through a cycle of baking, broiling, and steaming, meaning your food comes out crisp and moist, not dry as jerky. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Very Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to clean, even just after 4 pork chops got very dirty, tried natural and chemical products and nothing worked, grease and other food attached and impossible to remove. Also you can start the cooking cycle from your iPhone. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Erick Quesada

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working at 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I received this oven on 5/29 and it stopped working on 8/31 (the return date expired 6/28). This was an awful lot of money for something that only lasted 3 months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Live Without It
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. And I love their meal plan. Every night we get a variety of dinners that always come out perfectly. This is a huge time saver. Scan the barcode and the food cooks automatically. The oven is very solid and well-made. We have been telling all our friends to get one. So I highly recommend this oven.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID H.

customer_reviews.text: No real steam coming out. And leaks quickly so each time I used the steam function, the bottom tray is filled with old water in 10 seconds.

customer_reviews.title: Tovala is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely phenomenal. It totally changes the game for home cooking. It’s incredibly easy to set up and use. The meals are cooked to perfection every time and produces quality I could never achieve on my own, all while taking significantly less time to prepare with virtually no clean up. It’s amazing and I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to use, the recipe ideas are delicious, and the meals are restaurant quality. I highly recommend this for anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Simple - just plug in and start cooking!

customer_reviews.title: Accessible

customer_reviews.title: Very cool tech!

customer_reviews.author: Nancy D

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Tovala meals.
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple of months now, very happy with oven.
customer_reviews.author: curtis beshears

customer_reviews.title: This oven is amazing!!!! Love the meals and the recipes inside the app.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this oven for over a year now and I have the weekly meals subscription. I use the oven everyday for cooking other things too, like toast, nuggets, brussel sprouts, ect. The app has recipe inside that help you cook and how to use the oven, love this feature sooooooo much! The oven is totally worth the cost and my presciouus counter space. For us it replaced our microwave. Setting up the Wifi was also really easy, they have great cusptemer support too. yay!
customer_reviews.author: MMVD

customer_reviews.title: A thousand thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This oven (and the meal plan) is a game changer for our family of two working parents with two small children. The food delivery is fresh, delicious and healthy and could not be simpler to prepare. There is really nothing better than doing 30 seconds of prep and coming back 15ish minutes later to a perfectly cooked meal. We also use our Tovala ("tovie" in our house) to cook our own food - I am especially impressed by how well it does salmon, tofu, chicken, roasted veggies and, perhaps most importantly, reheats pizza.
customer_reviews.author: DSMPerk

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and easy way to cook healthy meals at home!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE our Tovala oven. It’s so convenient, and it has helped us to cook healthy meals at home much more frequently. We love the meals that we receive through their meal service, but we have also really enjoyed trying new recipes on our own. We’ve gotten some great ideas from the Tovala chefs, and from the online Tovala community / FB group. Lastly, we are so impressed by their customer service! Quick to reply if we have any issues / questions about our oven or our meal service. Couldn’t be happier with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitchen Appliance We Own
customer_reviews.text: Can’t live without the Tovala. The simplicity, quick cooking time (<20min), and easy cleanup of Tovala trumps them all. The meals also taste fantastic and the options are updated weekly. The value is worth it, coming out to $12 per meal which is cheaper than ordering in. Best of the all the food taste great, way better than anything microwaved. We are also starting to use it for meal prep (chicken breasts, salmon, etc) because the oven settings cook them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas E. Kreifels

customer_reviews.title: A complicated $300 oven that can not be repaired.
customer_reviews.text: The oven cooks amazing, but the build quality will cause something to fail, and when that 1 thing fails you will have a $300 broken oven that can not be repaired. Such a disappointment. For us, that one thing was a fan. For others it is a heating element.
customer_reviews.author: Jack The Rippa

customer_reviews.title: This oven only operates on 2.4G WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I received the oven as a gift and I am excited to use it. However . . . the oven only operates using 2.4G WiFi connection. I have 5G. Comcast was able to split by account to a 2.4G and 5G, that's when things really went sideways. My Internet crashed and its going on 5 hours to try and get it repaired. I didn't see anything in the promotional materials that the WiFi connection was 2.4G in order to use the app and the scan feature. The oven is still functional but without the 2.4G WiFi the App and Scan are useless. I'm disappointed because I was super excited to use the Tovala and meal service.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: You Have To See It In Action
customer_reviews.text: We started using Tovala about 2 years ago and have never looked back! We’ve gotten our parents and friends to purchase as well! My wife and I order 6 meals per week (3 each) and it makes for amazing and healthy weeknight dinners when we’re working late and don’t want to cook or order takeout. We also use the Gen 2 Oven to toast and make hard boiled eggs almost every weekend. The steam makes the best toast and bagels I’ve ever had. I don’t clean it as often as we should, but when we do, the removable tray makes it easy, and there is a clean cycle right in the app. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rich A Funk

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: As someone who works long hours and doesn't like to cook, Tovala has been an absolute game changer. The smart oven was easy to set up, and it's easy to operate. The meals are delicious, and there is actually a lot of variety in terms of the meals they offer each week. I put convenience at a premium, and Tovala meals are easy to make thanks to the smart oven. The clean up after is also minimal. I have found that since buying my Tovala, I eat healthier and have saved considerably from ordering less takeout. I'm incredibly happy that I found out about Tovala.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionized my way of eating
customer_reviews.text: As a busy working professional, figuring out what to eat for dinner is often the last thing on my mind. At the same time, I do love food, and I care about what I'm putting in my body. I love that the meals are tasty, convenient, and well-portioned. I get an e-mail every Wednesday reminding me to pick my meals, and that's it. No meal prepping/ planning, no grocery store visits, no mess. I just pop it in my Tovala, and voila. Dinner ready.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Westerlund

customer_reviews.title: Good oven, bad service.
customer_reviews.text: Good little toaster oven, but customer service on the food delivery is terrible and makes this a horrible and expensive option. They do not readily refund for food that arrives spoiled or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: An easy step toward a healthier me
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly easy to make healthier food choices with this tool. Not only are their meals convenient and nutritious, I can also scan any Trader Joe’s meal. Making this my most used and favorite kitchen tool. I was skeptical at first, but completely won over to its ease of use - just scan the barcode and let the oven do the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Crews

customer_reviews.title: Burning plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: HELP!! I have set up my oven according to the instructions -- but I have been nearly asphyxiated three times now, each time I have tried to use the oven. It absolutely REEKS of burning plastic every time. I've now tried to "burn it in," as instructed on the Google. I've wiped out the inside with warm soapy water. I've turned up the heat to 450 degrees for 45 minutes. Gosh I hope it stops smelling soon. I can't take it!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Steward

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Finally, something for the busy professional that offers a way to quickly cook great tasting meals with basically no prep work. Great smart oven and even better meals purchased through Tovala!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Oven: great. Meal service: just okay.
customer_reviews.text: The oven is great. It has tons of cooking options, and the scan to cook feature for Trader Joe’s oven items (and several other brands) is a big selling point. The meal service is also, pretty good, although the variety is really uneven, if you are a vegetarian. The oven is worth it on its own, though, and the meal service is worth having since you can opt to skip weeks as frequently as you want when you aren’t happy with the selection.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Veeneman

customer_reviews.title: Needs a 2.4 network
customer_reviews.text: I did not get this oven from Amazon I got it somewhere else that included for dinners. I was so anxious and couldn’t wait to set it up however no one ever said that it would not work on the 5G network and most homes now have 5G. I thought I had both a 2.4 and 5G network but unfortunately the oven and the app on the phone would not even recognize the 2.4. So beware if you have 5 g the oven will not connect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Tovala! Clean, delicious meals that take 1-2 min of my time. So amazing.
customer_reviews.author: sunrock

product_meta.title: Tovala Gen 1 Smart Steam Oven with Automatic Multi-Mode Cooking
product_meta.description: Style:GENERATION 1The Tovala Steam Oven with Tovala IQ, the only app-enabled steam oven with a brain. Tovala IQ means professional chef expertise is built right in, letting you cook on autopilot. The Tovala Steam Oven is a countertop, WiFi-connected oven that pairs with Tovala’s free mobile app for versatile and effortless home cooking. The Tovala Steam Oven lets you cook like a chef—thanks to its professional-grade features with 5 different cooking modes: steaming, baking, broiling, reheating, and toasting. Combine convection baking and steam to make juicy meat, tender fish, and vibrant veggies. Bake more evenly and efficiently than a convection bake oven—with half the normal preheat time. Broil on hi or lo to use radiant heat to give food the perfect browning. Bring leftovers back to life with a chef-perfected reheat cycle of steaming, baking, and broiling. Toast with 5 settings that use steam to make you the best toast you've ever had. From the Tovala App, you can access dinner, breakfast, and kids’ recipes created by our chefs, prepped easily by you with groceries at home, and cooked automatically in your Tovala with perfect results every time. Say goodbye to your old toaster oven. The future of home cooking is here. When you're too busy and don't have time to cook, use Tovala Meals to make a healthy dinner with no prep and no cleanup (companion meal delivery service sold separately in 48 contiguous states). Prepped by professional chefs, Tovala Meals are delivered weekly. All you have to do is scan the meal's barcode and let the Tovala Steam Oven cook your dinner to perfection. In 20 minutes or less, you'll enjoy a home-cooked meal without any of the work!
feature_bullets: Best use of your counter space. The Tovala steam oven has 5 different cooking methods, that let you steam, bake, broil, toast, and reheat all in one.
With Tovala newest feature, scan the store, you can now cook store-bought food perfectly. All you have to do is scan its barcode and press start. Currently compatible with trader joe's frozen food.
Using Wi-Fi, program your oven to steam, bake, and broil in sequence. Your phone is your remote for precision cooking and perfect results every time.
Cook like a professional chef with a library of recipes. Our Tovala app lets you automate away the guesswork.
Make Tovala meals with the scan of a barcode. When you scan a metal's barcode, your Tovala steam oven knows exactly how to cook it to perfection (Tovala meals are sold separately).
Get time back during a busy week. Make dinner simply by pressing start. No meal planning, no prepping, and no sink full of dishes.
